testcase.classname: User should be able to do shopping
testcase.name: As a user I can buy product(s) and give an order
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to the URL..............................................passed Then user enters username to login..........................................passed Then user enters password to login..........................................passed And user enters login button................................................passed Then user adds products to cart.............................................passed Then user goes to cart......................................................passed And user clicks on the checkout button......................................passed Given user enters the necessary information and continues...................passed Then user checks the informations and products are added correctly..........passed Then user clicks on the finish button.......................................passed And user clicks on the back home button.....................................passed Then user verifies the homepage.............................................passed And closes the app..........................................................passed

testcase.system-out: When user navigates to the URL..............................................passed Then user enters username to login..........................................passed Then user enters password to login..........................................passed And user enters login button................................................passed Then user adds products to cart.............................................passed Then user goes to cart......................................................passed And user clicks on the checkout button......................................passed Given user enters the necessary information and continues...................passed Then user checks the informations and products are added correctly..........passed Then user clicks on the cancel button.......................................passed And closes the app..........................................................passed
